Title: Goodbye, Toby (1)
Plot: Toby leaves Dunder Mifflin, and Michael plans a huge goodbye party... out of joy. Angela refuses to help with it, so Michael turns to Phyllis. Dwight and Meredith harass Holly, their new HR representative.
GuestStars: Amy Ryan, Hugh Dane, Robert R. Shafer, Gene Stupnitsky, Lee Eisenberg, Michael Schur
